channel.title: No-ip changes your ip address randomly?
channel.description: ok, about 6 months ago i created my private server (going great) but i'm just wondering if anyone had this problem too: once every week, day or month or so... no-ip duc seems to randomly change my ip and it gets annoying because i have to reconfigure everything that uses this ip... anyone got the same problem?

item.title: No-ip changes your ip address randomly?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:4, topic:312433”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=408832.msg3017884#msg3017884 date=1257350605]
Its called dynamic ip bro. If you think your server is really pro and do not want to change where your no-ip directs to, ask your ISP for a static ip however for normal internet browsing this is not useful.
[/quote]Can’t you just use Windows to reconfigure it?[/quote] You can.

Read full topic
item.source: No-ip changes your ip address randomly?

item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

ok, about 6 months ago i created my private server (going great) but i’m just wondering if anyone had this problem too:
once every week, day or month or so… no-ip duc seems to randomly change my ip and it gets annoying because i have to reconfigure everything that uses this ip…
anyone got the same problem?
